roleset.name: make rattling noises
roleset.note: CLATTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'clatter' based on sentences in brown. (from clatter.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: locatives are not directions
example.text: He beat the air with his stick, and it fell from his claws and clattered on the stones.

roleset.name: move while clattering
roleset.note: CLATTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'clatter' based on sentences in brown. (from clatter.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: no clever name
example.text: He clattered down the stairs and out of the door.
example.arg: down the stairs and out the door
